name: Bottom of the 9th (itch)
description:
IMPORTANT: THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. IF THERE ARE ANY BUGS ENCOUNTERED, PLEASE COMMENT AND LET US KNOW.

Wizardball. A game, elusive in its ruleset, yet strictly enforced nonetheless. A champion, fallen from grace, is given the chance to take one last fiendish swing. Will fate give them the pieces of the puzzle they need? Or will it trap them, deep in the underworld? It’s the Bottom of the 9th, and the bases are loaded. When they step up to bat, it comes down to a simple question: hit, or miss?

Trigger Warnings; Mentions of Gore, Death, Drug Use,  Alcoholism, and Medical Death.

Bottom of the 9th is a Random Encounter based Visual Novel, with a Team Building aspect. Each run is unique.
